means: 迷信，迷信行为( superstition的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Old superstitions seem incredible to educated people.
sentence.Network_cn: 旧的迷信对于受过教育的人来说是不可思议的.

sentence.Network_en: Do away with all fetishes and superstitions.
sentence.Network_cn: 破除一切盲目崇拜和迷信.

sentence.Network_en: Although superstitions involve beliefs and practices, they are usually transmitted as sayings.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然迷信涉及的是信仰和行为, 但它往往以谚语的形式出现.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Many Midsummer Night ' s superstitions and customs are similar to those observed on Christmas Eve ., 许多仲夏夜的迷信说法和风俗与圣诞夜的风俗习惯几乎如出一辙.
There are also songs , sayings and superstitions ., 还有歌曲 , 名言和迷信传说.

and what is more important is not to point out others' superstitions , but to discern that , under our own solid faith , hidden superstitions can also be found .而更重要的是，不是指证别人的迷信，而是认清，在自己妥实的信仰下面，也隐藏著迷信的可能性。
They tried their Best to liberate people from superstitions ., 他们尽力使人们摆脱迷信的束缚.

list.abs: the resembling religious superstition and the folk beliefs in the han dynasty ., 汉代的类宗教迷信和民间信仰.
"eradicate"怎么... ... Eradicate Invisibility 消除隐形; eradicate superstition 破除迷信; Eradicate and Evolve 消灭与进化.
陈瑞麟、薛清江 (译)，Paul Gross &Norman Levitt (原著)《高级迷信》(Higher Superstition)，新新闻出版社，台北市，2001 年 7 月。

Russia did not join in the bourgeois revolution , and there appeared absolutely Tsarism , autarchy , terror , individual superstition and police country after its revolution .俄国没有参与资产阶级革命，革命后的俄国出现了绝对的沙皇主义、独裁、恐怖、个人迷信和警察国家。

entry.def: Superstition is belief in things that are not real or possible, for example magic.

example.ex: Fortune-telling is a very much debased art surrounded by superstition...
example.tran: 算命是一种非常低级的把戏，充满了迷信色彩。

example.ex: The phantom of the merry-go-round is just a local superstition.
example.tran: 旋转木马的幽灵只不过是当地的迷信说法。

auth_sentence.content: For some people, different superstitions surround this festival.
auth_sentence.res_content: For some people, different superstitions surround this festival.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For some people, different superstitions surround this festival.

auth_sentence.content: Primitive superstitions have no place in the modern world.
auth_sentence.res_content: Primitive superstitions have no place in the modern world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Primitive superstitions have no place in the modern world.

auth_sentence.content: Superstitions about magpies go back a long way.
auth_sentence.res_content: Superstitions about magpies go back a long way.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Superstitions about magpies go back a long way.
